title: Looking for Team
body:
TOP MAIN
G4 (As of now)

Im currently in a team as of rn and looking for a replacement for them as im leaving them 
Was captain and head shot caller and strat creator

Im only g4 right now but stuck in promos for a week so i should be plat by the end of the season
Looking for fellow golds and platinums 
The best option would to also live in WA but if not 
NO DRAMA
Its all about the online tournaments anyways

Ill be reading the comments and want confident lads/ladies that know how to play properly and hopefully past experiences from tournaments would help
